product_name: La Roche-PosayCicaplast B5 Soothing Repair Spray for Dry Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganLa Roche-Posay Cicaplast B5 Soothing Repair Spray repairs and instantly soothes dry, compromised skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides long lasting 24 hour hydrationHelps repair the skin barrierTouch free application and invisible texture on skinSuitable for dry to extra dry, compromised skinSuitable for babies 2 months and upKey IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesMadecassoside known for its nourishing propertiesVitamin B5 helps the skin feel soothed and nourishedGlycerin, a humectant, helps hydrate skinFormulated WithoutAlcoholFragranceItem 2633772How To UseApply after cleansing, once skin is dry, spray 6 inches from affected area on Body or Face, no need to rub in.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Mannose, Madecassoside, Manganese Gluconate, Sodium Chloride, Coco-Betaine, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate.
how_to_use: Apply after cleansing, once skin is dry, spray 6 inches from affected area on Body or Face, no need to rub in.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: Helps with Dry/irritated Skin
reviews.comments: I've been using this for a year, and it's the product I always come back to whenever my skin feels irritated. When the skin is dry, its protective barrier becomes weakened, leaving it more susceptible to irritation, inflammation, and breakouts. This product helps replenish hydration and strengthen my skin's barrier. Highly recommend. Fyi, not being sponsored to say this.

reviews.headline: Burned my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin and this one unfortunately isnt skin friendly for me. It sprays on easily byt as soon as it touched my skin and settled it burned my skin and you could see the inflammation and reddish areas on my face.

reviews.headline: GREAT PRODUCT!!
reviews.comments: Its been clearing at my acne SO fast!! Its very hydrating and amazing for my very sensitive skin.  The only doen side of it is that the spray nozzle is very small and it it started spraying in a line rather than mist in just a couple of days.

reviews.headline: Helped my skin QUICKLY
reviews.comments: sensitive, acne prone, inflamed skin. Oral med and Tret for acne which has improved.However, it seems after long use of the Tret my skin has started to be come dry worse w/ spot treatment for start of a breakout. In 1 day this soothed skin. It leaves me looking glowy and hydrated.

reviews.headline: 3.5 stars
reviews.comments:
Good not great.
as someone with seb derm, its so hard to find products & the ingredients sound so good here.  
Doesnt irritate or make my derm worse but its just a bit sticky. You def have to "pat" it in a little. Also wish it sprayed more powerful.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: This is one of my favorite products!!! So hydrating and i honestly believe it helped clear my skin. No fragrance or smell. It is a musr have in my routine.

reviews.headline: Deserves more hype
reviews.comments: Why aren't more people talking about this? A dream for sensitive skin. Feels so hydrating and soothing. Will repurchase again and again.

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: The spray mechanism is great. Its not blasted out, it's gentle, so I don't tense up every time I need to rehydrate. I see an improvement in my skin. I purchased this to keep my skin hydrated after a fibroblast procedure. It helped a lot.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Rarely review products but I had to for this. This is a great multi-use product. I transferred this into a dropper style bottle and use it on my scalp after I use more drying shampoos(Nizoral, clarifying shampoos etc). My scalp and hair have never felt better or healthier. I use it on my toddler son's ocassional dry skin patch. It has become a staple in our bathroom. Will always repurchase.

reviews.headline: Yes this works, butâ€¦
reviews.comments: This works great. I just don't like the left over feeling. Instead of feeling smooth or even a bit on the greasy side (which I like because I have dry skin) it leaves a slightly sticky film. I wanted to use this to refresh my face in the middle of the day and this is not it.

reviews.headline: Really love this spray!
reviews.comments: I used to use the b5 balm but recently started using the spray and I LOVE IT! It helps relieve my dry skin that is prone to redness and is so convenient to spray on morning and night with my normal skincare regimen: already bought a replacement to have on hand!

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL PRODUCT!
reviews.comments:
I'm pregnant, it's winter, and my very sensitive & dry skin is severely dry and dehydrated. No matter what I've been doing, I've woken up flaky and itchy! my cave was so red from dryness and irritation. 

I recently saw the spray and decided to give it a try. I use it after cleansing, like a toner, and spray until my face is saturated. Then I use my serums, oils, and moisturizer. Then I saturate my face again with the spray. 

My skin is so soft and moisturized I will NEVER go without this product again! You NEED THIS! There is no other product on the market comparable to this.

reviews.headline: La Roche Posay will always hold a candle for me
reviews.comments: The spray is super hydrating and soothing in such a convenient spray form. The product feels like it contains a lot of glycerin, which helps plump my dehydrated skin and gives that glass-skin finish without ever causing my sensitive skin to break out.  But, it does unfortunately leave a bit of a sticky residue on my normal/combo skin which takes some time to fully absorb. So far I have found that it still sets nicely under make up, but if you have combination or oily skin I could see this being too much.

reviews.headline: Amazing so far!
reviews.comments: For the record ive never used the cicaplast cream before. I have used the spray the last 2 nights as my moisturizer and my face has never been so smooth when i wake up in the morning. Will keep using!

media.headline: Helped my skin QUICKLY
media.caption: Before- during a "flare up / break out"

media.headline: Helped my skin QUICKLY
media.caption: A week or so later- so much calmer and quickly in comparison to normal
